actions.text: This is my fridge. Sadly, there's nothing in it...
I should clean this stove sometime

mapActions.text: This is my fridge. Sadly, there's nothing in it...
I should clean this stove sometime

stats.name: Johanna
stats.description: Attractive but unintelligent, the influencer relies on their Fitness and Beauty. Well suited for a light weapons and high Charisma build.

Break the internet.description: Distracts the opponent based on the Influencers Attractiveness. More effective against characters who have low Beauty, Fitness and Speech skills.

Muscle.skillDesc: Muscle determines the weight you can carry. Important for Heavy Weapons.

Fitness.skillDesc: Fitness determines how long you can run. Also imporant for Attractiveness and Acrobatics.

Willpower.skillDesc: Willpower influences your Learning skill and the amount of mana your spells cost.

Perseverance.skillDesc: Perseverance influences your Heavy Weapons skills and reduces the amount of damage you take.

Perception.skillDesc: Perception allows you to see your enemies weakness. It's also important for Learning and Light Weapons.

Wisdom.skillDesc: Wisdom influences your Trustworthyness. It also determines which spells you can use.

Athletics.skillDesc: Determines your running speed. Also influences Light Weapons and Acrobatics.

Sneak.skillDesc: Determines succes at sneaking and stealing. Also influences your Dodge skills.

Speech.skillDesc: Important for getting information out of people. Has influence on your Trustworthyness and Attractiveness.

Beauty.skillDesc: Can be used to distract or beguile NPC's and enemies. Strongly influences your Attractiveness.

Bartering.skillDesc: A high bartering skill can considerably decrease the prices you have to pay for items and assets.

Credit_Rating.skillDesc: Influences trustworthyness. Determines the amount of money you can loan and the amount of interest you pay.

Trustworthyness.skillDesc: Trustworthyness is especially important to Finance and Charisma oriented characters. Influences your reputation with parents and CEO's.

Attractiveness.skillDesc: Of high importance to Charisma oriented characters, Attractiveness gives you a wide range of small advantages in the game.

Acrobatics.skillDesc: Determines your jumping height and flexibility.

Learning.skillDesc: Influences the speed at which you master new spells, weapons and professions.

Light_Weapons.skillDesc: Influences your light weapon damage and proficiency.

Heavy_Weapons.skillDesc: Influences your heavy weapon damage and proficiency.

Dodge.skillDesc: Determines you chances at evading enemy attacks
